about_the_game:
Martial Arts Tycoon: Brazil invites players to inherit a Jiu-jitsu gym in the favelas of Rio De Janeiro. Develop your gym, design your classes, and teach your students. As your business grows, you'll unlock new gym policies, improve your community, while expanding into new gyms throughout the city and build a martial arts empire.



DEVELOP YOUR BUSINESS FROM THE GROUND UP


In Martial Arts Tycoon: Brazil, your journey begins with a single gym in the favela Morro Santo Amaro and a dream. As you step into the role of Lucas, a young gym owner, you'll have the opportunity to shape the future of your business by hiring a team of dedicated employees including janitors, coaches, and instructors. It's up to you to manage your finances wisely to fuel the growth of your franchise. Invest in a range of gym equipment to cater to your fighters' needs and make strategic upgrades to your facilities to attract more clientele. Once business is booming expand your franchise across Rio De Janeiro and build a Jiu-Jitsu empire.

TRAIN STUDENTS WITH UNIQUE BACKGROUNDS



Every student brings a unique background and distinctive traits to the mat, adding depth and variety to your gym. Develop classes to balance engagement and learning. For the most promising fighters, assign personalized workout regimens tailored to improve their strengths and round out their weaknesses. Keep a close eye on their progress, adjusting your strategies as they grow and develop. By honing their traits, you'll help them unlock their full potential, turning passionate novices into skilled martial artists. Each success is a testament to your mentorship, strategy, and the vibrant diversity of your academy.

COMPETE AND WIN CHAMPIONSHIPS

Being a Martial Arts Tycoon is about more than just running a gym - it's about creating champions. Your students are individuals with unique backgrounds and potential, and it's your task to mold them into top competitors. Devise specialized training routines to hone their skills for competition, guiding them to championship victories that amplify your gym's reputation. Every win brings more prestige to your academy, attracting a fresh wave of ambitious students. Harness the thrill of competition and the pride of mentorship as you carve a path to victory for your students and your business.

IMMERSE YOURSELF IN STUNNING GRAPHICS

Dive into the rich and vibrant world of Martial Arts Tycoon: Brazil, brought to life through the power of the Unreal Engine 5. Whether you're marveling at the bustling favelas, absorbing the ambience of your gym, or watching students practice Jiu-Jitsu with each other, the detailed graphics, stunning lighting effects, and realistic textures all come together to create a vivid and authentic representation of Rio de Janeiro, immersing you in the city's unique charm and energy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (min version 1809)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD FX 8370
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: (4GB VRAM) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti (Legacy GPU: GeForce GTX 960) / AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (min version 1809)
  • Processor: Intel i7-5775C/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: (6GB VRAM) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD RX 570 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
